癈字的基本解释

癈
fèi
痼疾，病长期不愈。

癈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fèi］
［《廣韻》方肺切，去癈，非。］
(1)废疾；残废。
(2)废弃；废除。

癈字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　癈； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页780第40
【唐韻】方肺切【集韻】【韻會】放吠切，?音廢。【說文】固病也。【增韻】固疾不復可用者。通作廢。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Department of Sui Characters] 　癈; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 780 No. 40
[Tang Yun] Fang Lung Cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Barking and cutting, the sound is useless. [Said the text] The disease is also solid. [Zeng Yun] Those who are no longer available for solid diseases. Pass void.
